item.title: Lisbon funicular worker among those killed in crash
item.description: Four employees of a non-profit organisation and a transport worker are among those who died.

item.title: Boko Haram kills at least 60 in overnight attack on Nigerian village
item.description: Many of those killed had recently returned to the village in Borno State, following years of displacement.

item.title: 'We are the troops': Inside Chicago's split communities as Trump vows to deploy National Guard
item.description: Some locals are working to prevent youngsters from sliding into gangs, but others ask the troops to come sooner.

item.title: Cable snapped before Lisbon funicular crash, investigators say
item.description: The rest of the mechanism worked properly, says a preliminary statement into the crash which killed 16 people.

item.title: Israel destroys second high-rise as assault on Gaza City intensifies
item.description: Israel continues to expand its military operation in Gaza, urging Palestinians to leave Gaza City and move south.
